entry.title: 004: Connecting the Dots
entry.content:
Connecting the Dots

Most of the things I like to do in life were once way out of reach.‎

I always say, you can never connect the dots going forward, but you can always trace them back.
entry.summary: Connecting the Dots Most of the things I like to do in life were once way out of reach.‎ I always say, you can never connect the dots going forward, but you can always trace them back.

entry.title: 003: Purpose Over Passion
entry.content:
003

Purpose Over Passion

Most of the things I like to do in life were once way out of reach.‎

So I just read that…

“Happiness can only come as the unintended side-effect of pursuing a cause greater than yourself. Purpose trumps passion always.”

Hmm… Do you agree? Author continues to say…

“When your why is strong enough, you’ll be willing to do whatever it takes. You need a cause you truly believe in. You’ll be willing to figuratively throw yourself — or your feelings — under the bus.”

I feel that.

Continues with…

“It’s not about you. It’s about the cause. It’s about your purpose, which is far greater than you.”

Also feel it.

“You don’t have to have “a box.” Let go of your imagined self-concept. Who you really are cannot be defined. Forgot what you think you are. Instead, follow your fears wherever they take you. They point the direction. Expose yourself.

Be who you want to be, not who your fears define you as. Live for a purpose bigger than yourself, something you believe in your bones.”

…

Let go of your imagined self-concept. Think about it.

…

Stick to the game plan. Things are working out, but stick to the plan. You can get comfortable living a life that is comfortable.

Face your fears.

Explore the unknown.

Aim for the stars, and reach out to your dreams.

002: Random Thoughts 004: Connecting the Dots

entry.title: 002: Random Thoughts
entry.content:
002

Random Thoughts

Most of the things I like to do in life were once way out of reach.‎

Begginings are all sorts of kinds of things.

They can be great, they can suck, they can be scary, they can be easy.

Then they can turn out to be shitty, or super awesome, or really easy or really hard.

They can be all screwy sometimes and fuck you over.

...

But you have to do it.

You have to start.

If you don’t, you won’t get to do all the things you want to do in life. If you wait forever, you’ll miss your chance. So you have to take risks.

The beggining of this whole writing thing is going to be all of the above. I don’t really know what I’m doing, but I know I have to do something instead of nothing.

I’ve wrote to myself before that your voice is one of the best tools. We don’t use it enough. Whether it be in the form of writings, videos, or real time.

The time for me is now.

...

So this is to a new beginning, and hopefully a brighter future. Whoever is reading this, go out and try to start something new. And no, I don’t mean start a new relationship...

...

I mean create something new. Do something new. Do what excites you. Most of the things I like to do in life were once way out of reach. You have to start somewhere to get where you want to be.

So why not start now?

...

001: Beginnings 003: Purpose Over Passion
